author: thorsten
msg: Removed the fbit plugin and moved all pipes that we need to the views plugin. I am using two new properties {project:conf} and {project:resources} in the views plugin.

author: thorsten
msg: Removed the fbit plugin and moved all pipes that we need to the views plugin. The views plugin will overide the skin *.html output. The plugin works with views and templates. It is not perfect yet but on the best way ;-)

author: ekoneil
msg: Cleanup and repackaging in the way that resource bundles are data bound with ${bundle}.

This renames and package scopes some internal classes and clarifies some of the APIs a bit.  Still lots of documentation to do.  Also need to cache the Map wrappers atop the resource bundles where possible.
